{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open Mesh |model=A42 |fcc_date=07/31/2017 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=outdoor access point, mesh hub |fcc_id=WT8OMA42 |ic_id=10103A-OMA42 |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cores=4 |ram1=128 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|WiFi Access Point}} "7016A1139014 V-1.10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Also known as the '''datto AP42'''. '''Open Mesh''' is a '''datto''' company Chip information was found in the User Manual document at the FCC.
